string.text: Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.¿Qué?
¿Qué? Stalker, necesito que ayudes a uno de mis colegas. Ir a él rápidamente! ¡Él te necesita!
Buena suerte, stalker.
Documentos de investigación de Sakharov
Some of Professor Sakharov's research papers were left behind when his scientist fled from a mutant attack. Recupere los documentos y devuélvalos a Sakharov.

Ah, yes, I'm glad you're here. Uno de mis investigadores acaba de regresar del campo. Tuvo que abandonar sus notas después de ser atacado por mutantes. Él está aterrorizado de volver allí. Necesito esa investigación, stalker. Recuérdalo por mí, con mucho gusto te compensaré por las molestias.
¡Gracias stalker! Por favor, tome esto como su pago.
Abnormal Measurement
Professor Sakharov asked your help in taking measurements of an abnormal anomaly, but you need to retrieve the $item_1 you lost first.
Professor Sakharov asked your help in taking measurements of an abnormal anomaly.\nHead over the marked location.
Professor Sakharov asked your help in taking measurements of an abnormal anomaly.\nUse the $item_1 to take measurements.
Professor Sakharov asked your help in taking measurements of an abnormal anomaly.\nReturn to him with the $item_1 and recorded results.

Ah, sí, bien! Te he estado esperando. Our scanners are showing interesting readings coming from a particular anomaly. I am in need of an experienced stalker to head over there and take measurements closely. I have the right device for you, young man. Buena suerte.
¡Ahora mi investigación puede comenzar! Gracias, stalker. Lo has hecho bien.
Buscar Lab X-18
El profesor Sakharov necesita los documentos de investigación contenidos en Lab X-18 en Valle Oscuro.

Oh si. ¡Bueno! Tengo un trabajo importante para ti. Se realizaron investigaciones importantes en el laboratorio X-18 pero no hemos podido obtener acceso para analizarlas. ¿Crees que puedes intentar recuperarlo para nosotros? Te pagaré bien si puedes. ¡Excelente!
¡Gracias stalker!
Plant the Scanner Near the Symbiont Anomaly
Professor Sakharov wants the anomaly scanner to be planted near the Symbiont anomaly in Red Forest.
Professor Sakharov wants the anomaly scanner to be planted near the Symbiont anomaly in Red Forest.\nGet an anomalous scanner first.
Professor Sakharov wants the anomaly scanner to be planted near the Symbiont anomaly in Red Forest.\nTake the scanner to the anomalous field.
Professor Sakharov wants the anomaly scanner to be planted near the Symbiont anomaly in Red Forest.\nTake the scanner to the anomalous field.
Professor Sakharov wants the anomaly scanner to be planted near the Symbiont anomaly in Red Forest.\nPlace the scanner.
Professor Sakharov wants the anomaly scanner to be planted near the Symbiont anomaly in Red Forest.\nReport on the implementation.

Splendid! Please take a look at this new scanner. We use these devices to scan anomalous acitivites during our scientific expeditions. One of the most interesting anomalies in the Zone is the Symbiont Anomaly, found deep inside the Red Forest. We want this scanner to be installed near that anomaly. It will help us to learn more about it's activity. \nThe location is dangerous, but hopefully it won't be an issue for a capable stalker like you. Please install it there for me, I will gladly compensate you for your trouble.
Thank you! Now we can study that phenomenon!
Science and Red Tape
Sakharov wants me to give him 17,000 RU so he can submit all the government paperwork needed for me to become an official Ecologist.

Ah, well, I'm sure you'd make for a great field assistant, but, the thing is, getting all the necessary paperwork done isn't exactly cheap, nor is it quick without some, er..."motivation". You know how these government types can be.\n \nPermanent contracts, licenses, IDs...I'll need at least 17,000 RU from you to pay for all this, especially if you want to see the results within your lifetime. If you're willing to part with such money, however, we'd gladly have you!
Wonderful! Excellent! Please, make yourself at home here, fellow Ecologist.
Investigación de caza de Semenov

El ayudante Semenov lo ha contratado para acompañarlo por el área local a fin de matar mutantes para que pueda recuperar muestras de tejido fresco y analizar los cadáveres con su equipo de exploración.

Would you mind helping me eliminate a few mutants so that I can take readings and tissue samples? Let's say... about five different mutants. I'll be putting my life in your hands, and you would need to ensure my safety. Te compensaré por tus esfuerzos.
Gracias por su ayuda, amigo. Tengo todas las muestras de tejido que necesito. Aquí está tu pago. Come back and see me again some time.
Encuentra %s
Sakharov necesita una muestra de tejido de un %s.
Necesito un stalker experimentado o un cazador de mutantes. ¿Es ese alguien tú?
I need to collect tissue samples from a %s. It is of no matter to me how you get it; just make sure it's fresh. Return as soon as you recover what I need from the mutant.
Gracias Señor. Esto me ayudará inmensamente en mi investigación.
Scientific Progress
Professor Sakharov has asked me to find a "%s" artefact.
Would you like to assist me with some research? I will pay you for your efforts.
Would you like to assist me with some research? I offer a reward for a "%s" artefact.
On behalf of the scientific community, I thank you. Here is the reward, as promised.
Classified Information
Obtain documents which contain classified information.

We have recently learned about the existence of documents which contain classified information on the Zone. They could be the key to a vital breakthrough in our research! Could you please retrieve them for us?
We are one little step closer to understanding the Zone now. Gracias.
Collect the psy-helmet
Professor Sakharov has agreed to recalibrate the psy-protection helmet. He has asked you to return to pick it up in a couple days.
Deshabilitar la máquina milagro
La Máquina Milagrosa evita que los stalkers viajen entre Yantar y la Ciudad Muerta. Disabling it will require advanced psy-protective equipment.
Find %s for Peregrine
%s are required by Peregrine to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Oye, ¿puedo pedirte un favor? Si está interesado en ayudarme, le diré lo que necesito.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas básicas. Debe contener lo que necesito. Si puede traer algo para mí, le estaré agradecido, incluso le ofreceré un descuento de aquí en adelante.
Great! You brought exactly what I've asked. Gracias.
Find %s for Peregrine
%s are required by Peregrine to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
De acuerdo, si estás preparado, necesito más herramientas. Pero pueden ser un poco más difíciles de encontrar. ¿Puedes hacer esto por mí? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas avanzadas. Debe contener lo que necesito. Si puede traer algo para mí, le estaré agradecido, incluso le ofreceré un descuento de aquí en adelante.
Regresa en cualquier momento si necesitas que revise tu equipo.
Find %s for Peregrine
%s are required by Peregrine to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
De acuerdo, si estás preparado, necesito más herramientas. Pero pueden ser un poco más difíciles de encontrar. ¿Puedes hacer esto por mí? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas.
Debe contener lo que necesito. Debe contener lo que necesito. Si puede traer algo para mí, le estaré agradecido, incluso le ofreceré un descuento de aquí en adelante.
Regresa en cualquier momento si necesitas que revise tu equipo.
Recover the tracking device

We have implanted several devices on mutants to collect data about their movements, habits and other information. However since the last blowout some have started malfunctioning, they still transmit the coordinates but not the rest of the data so it is necessary to recover them manually. You'll have to suppress the mutant and bring back the device here.
Kill the mutant with the tracking device
Recover the tracking device
Return the device
A device that was planted on a mutant to track its movements and other data, besides some scratch marks it seems to be in a farly good condition.
Tracking device
